Demo app for RecyclerView and Expandable RecyclerView UI update

Expandable RecyclerView Demo app contains two fragments screen "BASIC" and "EXPANDABLE". As name suggests In "BASIC", Normal RecyclerView used to show simple vertically scrollable List Items, As shown in screens timer will reduced every second (Like stop watch).
In "EXPANDABLE", customized RecyclerView (i.e ExpandableRecyclerView) used to expanding and collapsing list items.
You can view the source code also
